ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, but your hope something comes of this when you found you could ALT - TAB out of the game and hope someone could write a cheat program says it all. If
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, but your "hope something comes of this" when you found you could
ALT - TAB out of the game and hope someone could write a cheat program says
it all. If you played it straight on Diablo and had a good time, why would
you want people to write a cheat program to exploit EverQuest. That just
doesn't make any sense to me. UNLESS you are the kind of person that needs
to cheat to have fun. If you're not, I apologize, but then I just don't
understand why you would sent that email.

Macabre
----- Original Message -----
From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 9:08 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....


> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> I did not say that I had to cheat to have fun with EQ. I have lots of fun
> and haven't taken advantage of any of the "cheats" that this list has
> provided. I use the guest info, but I don't trap monsters or anything.
> From Diablo I was one of the ppl that made it to level 50 with no cheats,
> and only items that I found so I knew they were legit. I also had a
> hacked-to-heck character on Diablo b/c sometimes I think it's fun to run
> around and kill anything ya darn well please.
>
> if I had to cheat to have fun I wouldn't play EQ.
>
> Omeg
>
> please note lack of flames.
>
>
> >It's players like you that make me sick. Why the hell bother playing this
> >game, if you need to cheat at it to have fun. Go bother someone else's
> >game.
> >
> >Macabre
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to online communities.

goto www.everquest.com
